LanguageData.RGK_Terrain.label: 木地板
LanguageData.RGK_Terrain.description: 木板地板的温暖，家庭的感觉。虽然它很快铺设，它也非常易燃。
LanguageData.GL_Terrain.label: wood floor
LanguageData.GL_Terrain.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
LanguageData.PebbleSandstone.label: 砂岩鹅卵石地板
LanguageData.PebbleGranite.label: 花岗鹅卵石地板
LanguageData.PebbleLimestone.label: 石灰鹅卵石地板
LanguageData.PebbleSlate.label: 板岩鹅卵石地板
LanguageData.PebbleMarble.label: 大理鹅卵石地板
